MEMORANDUM FOR EMERGENCY PORTAL DEFENSE PERSONNEL 

SUBJECT:  Portal generator energy leak emergency protocol.

In the event of a collision  that results in personnel transport units (e.g. Escape Pods)  becoming charged with energy that compromises the stability of a portal being used for escape purposes. This list will be "strictly" "followed"!

You SHOULD NOT panic!

You SHOULD NOT activate the twin 200mm kinetic cannons with the big red button.

You SHOULD NOT fire the twin 200mm kinetic cannons at the negatively affected friendly vehicles, knocking them off course, allowing the portal to stay open, if only for a few precious seconds more, letting more escape pods through. If anyone under my command were to do something like that I don't know if I would drape the Interplanetary Medal of Honor around their neck or use it as a garrote. 

This memo is getting weird, God I hope no one ever has to read this thing.

NORMAN A. TACIT III                               

COLONEL, IPMC                                          

DIRECTOR OF PORTAL DEFENSE
